resources.string: The line terminator used. Most platforms support LF and it\'s the recommended value. If you don\'t know what this does, just leave it as LF.
If enabled, the file will be saved with a Byte Order Mark. This is generally NOT recommended, but can help other apps to recognize the encoding properly (only for UTF-8).
The encoding used for this file. Always use UTF-8, except when working with very old apps that don\'t support UTF-8.
